title: Laboratory sign
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134153im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0266_4482.JPG)

Starting with my Halloween decorations early. Wanted to use something different from Impact or Stencil, what font is this? I really like the vibe!

Thanks for helping!

iDD

Font: 

 Franchise (Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134153/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: iDarkDesign

comments.content: It must be **[Franchise (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134153/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Franchise%20-%20Bold&fid=e5f2f90ef20309de329a7d174c3d2245&fsize=60&text=ZOMBIE%20RESEARCH%20FACILITY&wrap=2)** free font by Derek Weathersbee
You sir, are correct! Thank you very much.
